solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean checkSubarraySum(int[] nums, int k) {--newline--        Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<Integer, Integer>(){{put(0,-1);}};;--newline--        int runningSum = 0;--newline--        for (int i=0;i<nums.length;i++) {--newline--            runningSum += nums[i];--newline--            if (k != 0) runningSum %= k; --newline--            Integer prev = map.get(runningSum);--newline--            if (prev != null) {--newline--                if (i - prev > 1) return true;--newline--            }--newline--            else map.put(runningSum, i);--newline--        }--newline--        return false;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}
